name: Data Transfer Mechanisms
definition: Framework for lawful international transfers of personal data outside EU/EEA

name: Adequacy Decision
definition: Commission decision that third country provides adequate protection level equivalent to GDPR

name: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)
definition: Pre-approved contractual terms and clauses for international transfers with data protection safeguards

name: Binding Corporate Rules (BCRs)
definition: Intra-group internal policies and rules with adequacy assessment for multinational organizations

name: Certification Mechanism
definition: Approved certification and monitoring mechanism approved by supervisory authority

name: Derogation for Specific Situations
definition: Limited exceptions for transfers on case-by-case basis where safeguards not otherwise available

name: Adequacy Decision Country
definition: Third country with Commission adequacy decision providing sufficient protection

name: Non-Adequate Country
definition: Third country without adequacy decision requiring transfer mechanism for lawful data transfer
